channel.title: Non Veg on Linguistrix
channel.description: Recent content in Non Veg on Linguistrix

item.title: Vegetarian’s Kolaveri
item.description: Enough. You have troubled us enough. Yes, you. Don’t run away. I am talking about you only. Everytime you are going for dinner with us, you will be nuisance whole time. First you will make sarcastic comments—”Why are you looking in menu card? anyhow you will eat only paneer”. Then you will pounce on our food also. When waiter comes with non-veg food, you will give silly smiles and ask him to serve to you only but when he comes with veg food you will tell him to serve to everyone.
